Options

openType.

How to open links one by one. The types are:

stop_and_go
Open single tab first, wait for a minute, open the others simultaneously.
cascade
Open tabs one by one. The time interval is exponentially decayed.
interval
Open tabs one by one. The time interval is constant

stop_and_go cascade interval

numLinksAtOnce

The number of links to open at once.

[tabs]

openIntervalTimeScale

The interval time between tab-opens.

[ms]

spell

The spell to shout when we run the command.

resetKeyboard

The keyboard shortcut to reset the number of already opened links.

shakeWindow

Whether or not shake window when the command is executed.

on
